item.title: Why Emacs is better than Vim
item.description: Emacs has unbelievable features for almost unlimited expansion versus Vim. Basically speaking, Vim has lower entry for beginners to easily try how to edit files by a couple of minutes to practice only if you could memorize some fundamental commands. While Emacs will frustrate people without patience then quickly losing courage and curiosity on going on. Emacs is so complicated that would take much more time than the most of people estimate if someone really tries to master it just like driving a car, or more similarity with playing piano - Have fun after long time suffered from practicing until the bright vision comes out.

item.title: Why text editor is so fascinating
item.description: Text editor is an integral part for human beings when carefully articulate the thoughts. People are not like machines that the recording capability depends on the pieces of parts made up of metal and wires but relying on flexible abilities. With the advancement of tools, no matter what operations would be melded into one giant piece - the text editors. Text editor is a trajectory for the reflection of people’s thoughts on real world text manipulation situation.
